website_summaries.verdict: Glass design is practical, comfortable to hold, and aesthetically pleasing.
pros: Glasses come in a decorative and protective box
Twist design makes glasses comfortable to hold and easy to grip
Comes in a set of two
cons: Etched lettering on bottom of the glass causes a slight, almost unnoticeable wobble

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite whiskey glasses
customer_reviews.text: If, like me, you enjoy your whiskey on ice then you’ve likely had the experience of holding a glass that leaves you concerned that it may slip from your hand due to condensation on the smooth vertical surface of the glass. Not only are these glasses more handsome than portrayed in the pictures, they also feel great in the hand due to their biaxial taper (radial & vertical). Art and ergonomics are rarely integrated this well in glassware - my hat is off to the designer and the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Timmer's Junk

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Shaped and Cut to fit your right hand
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful design and expert workmanship. The weight of the glass is what I would term "Perfect" for a Whiskey Glass. I have 3 other pairs of whiskey glasses that I have purchased in the last 2 months - These are My Favorite. Excellent Price, Excellent Product.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Great art style glass
customer_reviews.text: I got these because I liked the overall appearance and the presentation. The package came and was very well packed. The separate box that held the two glasses were very presentable in a nicely made box, so I liked the presentable aspect of it. The glass was thick and well constructed, overall, for the money and the type of glass to the presentation, it was a great gift idea and well received.
customer_reviews.author: The Quintessential Man

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: They don't sit perfectly flat. There is some kind of raised lettering or numbering on the bottom of the glass that cause a very slight wobble. I think I can gently file them down to get rid of the wobble. Other than that, I'm very pleased with them. They are exactly what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These glasses are excellent, a nice heavy glass that does not feel ...
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are excellent, a nice heavy glass that does not feel too big in your hand. Love the shape and the look of the glass, will definitely be getting more of these to complete a set.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Herme

customer_reviews.title: beautiful glasses
customer_reviews.text: these are very nice, heavy and beautiful. They would mke an excellent gift. The packaging was classic, dark blue box, looked expensive.

customer_reviews.title: Glasses look fine, but the storage box they come in cane damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Glasses look fine, but the storage box they come in came damaged. This made it to where now my father in law has nowhere to store them, even though the box was one of the selling points on this item. If the storage box is a buying point for you, you may be upset.

customer_reviews.title: Feels good in the hand, and I don't feel like I will break them.
customer_reviews.text: Glasses feel great in your hand, I really like the twist, perfect for my bourbon with a 2" ice cube. These glasses have three dimples on the bottom to keep the glasses from wobbling. I previously ordered and returned these glasses from another place on amazon, their glasses wobbled. These were cheaper and didn't wobble, I may buy another set just to have more, can't complain about anything with these glasses.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality,Great price.
customer_reviews.text: I love theze glasses. Nice,solid. Good weight. Perfect size for iceballs. The amazing packaging they arrived in was immaculate and great care had been taken to protect tbe glasses including foam with cutluts outs for securi g inside magnetic closure gift box,which wad also wrapoed in a giftable paper,then bubble wrapped again. Amazing glasses. 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: WilberisReal

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these as a Xmas gift for my boss and he loved them. His wife confirmed he uses them when he’s drinking his bourbon and relaxing. The only thing, and it’s not a big deal, but just saying, I had to wash the glasses before I gifted them because they had this cloudy film on them. But other than that... they were just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie D.

customer_reviews.title: Loved them bought some more.
customer_reviews.text: Love these glasses, have ordered 4 more. My husband knocked one off the table playing with the dog, so we figured we better order the extras.They are a healthy drink size. Best of all my arthritic hands can hold them without any problem.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice set of whiskey glasses
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband as a gift for his scotch, and they are really nice glasses and he really likes them. The twist gives them a modern look, but they are still classic, well made and quite heavy so they do not feel cheap at all. The box they come in is really nice.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice .

I told him the next time we meet, we can have a glass together. I'm glad he loved them! Thanks for the beautiful glasses!

Packaging was reason for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: pete ...

product_meta.title: Twist Whiskey Glasses Set of 2. Ultra Clarity Glass Rocks Tumblers (10oz) by Van Daemon for Liquor, Bourbon or Scotch. Perfectly Gift Boxed.
product_meta.description:
About Van Daemon Premium Glassware

Based in Sydney, Australia, Van Daemon’s mission is to bring you glassware of the highest quality to enhance the enjoyment of your chosen beverage.

At Van Daemon, we are lovers of unusual, boutique spirits and liquor.

We love the originality of ‘New World’ Whiskey and Spirits like those found in Tasmania (Van Diemen’s Land). For this reason, Van Daemon has scoured the world to find glassware with its own sense of style, originality and character.

Many of us look for similar characteristics in a liquor or whiskey tumbler; weight, heft, a sense of strength and substantiality… A glass that won’t be knocked over easily and is durable enough to retain its sparkle for many years to come.

Van Daemon’s Glassware delivers on these expectations, but more than that… they have their own unique design flair, character and idiosyncrasy.
feature_bullets: BEAUTIFULLY CRAFTED 10oz ROCKS GLASSES; Each heavy based tumbler holds 10 ounces and is large enough to accommodate 2” whiskey stones, cubes or an ice ball. Van Daemon Glassware is Dishwasher Safe.

PROTECTED IN A SECURE GIFT BOX; Each set of 2 Glasses comes in its own gift box, ensuring they arrive safely in perfect condition. Each quality box has a magnetic closure that shuts with a reassuring snap, meaning your glasses are safely stored for years and generations to come.

BEAUTIFUL 100% ULTRA CLARITY GLASS; The Heavy Base of Van Daemon Whiskey glassware gives them real substance and heft. Blending old fashioned design with contemporary touches, means Van Daemon Glasses are ideal for any liquor or cocktail – Whisky, Scotch, Bourbon, Vodka, Gin… or even plain water.

VAN DAEMON AUSTRALIAN HERITAGE; Between the south coast of Australia and Antarctica, you’ll find Tasmania… originally known as “Van Diemen’s Land”. With some of the world’s purest, freshest air, Van Diemen’s Land’s climate is unrivalled. For this reason, Tasmanian Spirits such as Whiskey, Vodka and Gin are amongst the most celebrated. Van Daemon was created in Australia and inspired by these spirits.
100% VAN DAEMON GUARANTEE; All Van Daemon Glassware comes with a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee.
